events.title: Richard and Mildred Loving plead guilty

movie.title: Loving
movie.plot: The story of Richard and Mildred Loving, an interracial couple, whose challenge of their anti-miscegenation arrest for their marriage in Virginia led to a legal battle that would end at the US Supreme Court.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 25 wins & 85 nominations.

movie.title: I, Tonya
movie.plot: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U. S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the sport is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

events.title: ice skater Nancy Kerrigan is attacked and injured by Shane Stant

movie.title: Tonya & Nancy: The Inside Story
movie.plot: Based on the true story of Tonya Harding and Nancy Kerrigan, rivals for the USA Olympic Ice Skating team. When Kerrigan is savagely attacked, people begin to wonder if the intense rivalry between the two was motivation for someone.

movie.title: Spotlight
movie.plot: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.
